TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlInputFile extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler
Public Class HtmlInputFile Inherits HtmlInputControl Implements IPostBackDataHandler

summary.span: 允许对服务器上的 HTML 元素进行编程访问。

span.span: Allows programmatic access to the HTML element on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用服务器控件以处理将二进制或文本的文件从浏览器客户端上载到服务器。Use the server control to handle uploading binary or text files from a browser client to the server. 文件上载适用于 Microsoft Internet Explorer 3.02 或更高版本。File upload works with Microsoft Internet Explorer version 3.02 or later. > [!NOTE] > 控件设计要在局部页面呈现过程中使用仅在回发的情况下，不能在异步回发的方案。The control is designed to be used only in postback scenarios and not in asynchronous postback scenarios during partial-page rendering. 当你使用控件内部控件，必须使用的控件时上载文件面板的对象。When you use a control inside an control, the file must be uploaded by using a control that is a object for the panel. 控制用于更新而不是使用回发更新整个页面的页面的选定的区域。 controls are used to update selected regions of a page instead of updating the whole page with a postback. 有关详细信息，请参阅[UpdatePanel 控件概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29a2265d-9674-4c19-b70e-e5560ee9689a)和[局部页面呈现概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49)。For more information, see [UpdatePanel Control Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29a2265d-9674-4c19-b70e-e5560ee9689a) and [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49). 若要指定要上载的文件，请到文件 (例如，"C:\MyFiles\Test.txt") 中的控件的文本框中输入完整路径。To specify the file to upload, enter the full path to the file (for example, "C:\MyFiles\Test.txt") in the text box of the control. 你还可以通过单击选择该文件**浏览**按钮，再然后定位在**选择文件**对话框。You can also select the file by clicking the **Browse** button and then locating it in the **Choose file** dialog box. > [!NOTE] > 属性控件必须设置为"multipart/窗体的数据"对于此控件使其正常工作。The property of an control must be set to "multipart/form-data" for this control to work properly. 控件不具有一种将回发到服务器的内置方法。The control does not have a built-in way to post back to the server. 若要将文件上载到服务器，使用方法对象中包含属性。To upload the file to the server, use the method of the object contained in the property. 例如，一个按钮单击、 通常的事件处理方法中执行此操作。This operation is usually done in an event-handling method, such as for a button click. > [!NOTE] > 当你使用方法类，请确保指定取得 root 权限的路径 (例如，"C:\MyFiles\Test.txt")。When you use the method of the class, make sure to specify a rooted path (for example, "C:\MyFiles\Test.txt"). 行为方法可以指定在[httpRuntime 元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369)配置节`requireRootedSaveAsPath`属性。The behavior of the method can be specified in the [httpRuntime Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369) configuration section with the `requireRootedSaveAsPath` attribute. 此特性的默认值为 `true`。The default value of this attribute is `true`. 如果将此属性设置为`false`，然后使用与未指定路径的方法将尝试将该文件置于`systemroot`\system32\inetsrv 目录。If you set this attribute to `false`, then using the method with no path specified will attempt to place the file in the `systemroot` \system32\inetsrv directory. 默认情况下，此目录是写保护;因此，可不存在保存文件。By default, this directory is write-protected; therefore, the file can not be saved there. 请确保提供对 ASP.NET 所使用的目录为你想要将文件存储的帐户的写入权限。Make sure to provide write permission for the account used by ASP.NET for the directory where you want to store the file. 上载大型文件时，使用`maxRequestLength`属性[httpRuntime 元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369)元素增加允许的最大文件大小。When uploading large files, use the `maxRequestLength` attribute of the [httpRuntime Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369) element to increase the maximum allowable file size. 此文件指定的大小超过时，将在浏览器中生成 DNS 错误。A DNS error is generated in the browser when the file exceeds the specified size. 上载大型文件时，还可能会收到以下错误消息：You might also receive the following error message when uploading large files: aspnet_wp.exe (PID: 1520年) 被回收，因为内存消耗超出 460 MB （60%的可用 RAM)。aspnet_wp.exe (PID: 1520) was recycled because memory consumption exceeded 460 MB (60 percent of available RAM). 如果遇到此错误消息，你将会增加的值`memoryLimit`属性中[processModel 元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b8fe20e-74c8-4566-b72c-ce5f83c8e32d) Machine.config 文件的元素。If you encounter this error message, increase the value of the `memoryLimit` attribute in the [processModel Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4b8fe20e-74c8-4566-b72c-ce5f83c8e32d) element of the Machine.config file. 有关的实例的初始属性值的列表，请参阅构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件创建一个简单的文件上载方案。The following code example demonstrates how to use the control to create a simple file upload scenario. 对于此示例中正常工作，你需要创建一个名为目录`Temp`上你的计算机的驱动器 c。For this example to work properly, you need to create a directory called `Temp` on your computer's drive C. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlInputFile Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputFile Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlInputFile Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputFile Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数来创建和初始化的新实例类。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 下表显示的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||"文件"文字字符串。The "file" literal string.| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建 类的新实例。The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance of the class. 对于此示例中正常工作，你需要创建一个名为目录`Temp`上你的计算机的驱动器 c。For this example to work properly, you need to create a directory called `Temp` on your computer's drive C. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputFileCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputFileCtor/CS/htmlinputfilectorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputFileCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputFileCtor/VB/htmlinputfilectorvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Accept { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用逗号分隔的 MIME 编码列表，该列表用于约束用户可以选择的文件类型。

span.span: Gets or sets a comma-separated list of MIME encodings used to constrain the file types the user can select.

value.span: 用逗号分隔的 MIME 编码列表。

span.span: The comma-separated list of MIME encodings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于指定要上载到服务器的文件类型。Use this property to specify the file type that can be uploaded to the server. 例如，若要限制选定范围向映像，将此属性设置"映像 / \*"。For example, to restrict the selection to images, set this property to "image/\*". > [!NOTE] > 此属性的支持与浏览器相关。Support for this property is browser-dependent. 检查你的浏览器，以确定它是否支持此属性。Check your browser to determine whether it supports this property. 建议你使用服务器端代码以确保该文件是预期类型。It is recommended that you use server-side code to ensure that the file is of the expected type. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以限制用户从选择的图像文件之外的任何文件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to restrict the user from selecting any file other than an image file. 对于此示例中正常工作，你需要创建一个名为目录`Temp`上你的计算机的驱动器 c。因为支持属性为依赖于浏览器的将服务器端执行检查以确保上载了仅图像。For this example to work properly, you need to create a directory called `Temp` on your computer's drive C. Because support for the property is browser-dependent, a server-side check is performed to ensure that only images are uploaded. 如果上载的文件不能读取为引发异常类型。An exception is thrown if the uploaded file can not be read as an type. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlInputFile.Accept Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputFile.Accept Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlInputFile.Accept Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputFile.Accept Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

This method always returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件实现接口，有两种方法：和。The control implements the interface, which has two methods: and . 方法由调用方法，始终返回`false`，以指示，控件的状态不由 ASP.NET 页框架管理。The method is called by the method and always returns `false`, indicating that the control's state is not managed by the ASP.NET page framework. 主要由控件开发人员扩展功能的使用方法控件。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxLength { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置从客户机上载的文件的文件路径的最大长度。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum length of the file path for the file to upload from the client computer.
The maximum length of the file path.

value.span: 默认值为 -1，表示还未设置该属性。

span.span: The default value is -1, which indicates that the property has not been set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于指定可以为路径输入到要上载的文件的字符数的限制。Use this property to specify a limit for the number of characters that can be entered for the path to the file to upload. > [!NOTE] > 此属性的支持与浏览器相关。Support for this property is browser-dependent. 检查你的浏览器，以确定它是否支持此属性。Check your browser to determine whether it supports this property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有指定编码的网页控件，属性设置为"multipart/窗体的数据"。If no encoding is specified for the Web page's control, the property is set to "multipart/form-data". ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法，以便`Title`属性始终会添加到每个自定义控件。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method so that a `Title` attribute is always added to each custom control. 对于此示例中正常工作，你需要创建一个名为目录`Temp`上你的计算机的驱动器 c。For this example to work properly, you need to create a directory called `Temp` on your computer's drive C. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlInputFileOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputFileOnPreRender/CS/custom_htmlinputfile_onprerendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlInputFileOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputFileOnPreRender/VB/custom_htmlinputfile_onprerendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlInputFileOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputFileOnPreRender/CS/custom_htmlinputfile_onprerender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlInputFileOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputFileOnPreRender/VB/custom_htmlinputfile_onprerender.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取对由客户端指定的上载文件的访问。

span.span: Gets access to the uploaded file specified by a client.
A that accesses the file to be uploaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 浏览器安全限制可以防止受到跨多个请求维护此值。Browser security restrictions prevent this value from being maintained across multiple requests. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用启动的实用程序，将文件传输到服务器的属性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to initiate the utility that transfers the file to the server. 请注意，如果已上载文件以字节为单位的大小超过的值属性，该文件未上载。Note that if the size of the uploaded file in bytes exceeds the value of the property, the file is not uploaded. 对于此示例中正常工作，你需要创建一个名为目录`Temp`上你的计算机的驱动器 c。For this example to work properly, you need to create a directory called `Temp` on your computer's drive C. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlInputFile.PostedFile Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputFile.PostedFile Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlInputFile.PostedFile Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputFile.PostedFile Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件实现接口，有两种方法：和。The control implements the interface, which has two methods: and . 方法不参与的处理控制，并且将包含完成接口的实现。The method does not participate in the processing of the control and is included to complete the interface implementation. 方法主要由控件开发人员来扩展的功能控件。The method is used primarily by control developers to extend the functionality of the control.

summary.span: 获取客户机上文件的完整路径。

span.span: Gets the full path of the file on the client's computer.

value.span: 客户端文件的完整路径。

span.span: The full path of the client's file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性检索客户端的计算机 (例如"C:\MyFiles\Test.txt") 上的文件的完整路径。The property retrieves the full path of the file on the client's computer (for example "C:\MyFiles\Test.txt"). 当您需要知道提交该文件的计算机上存储文件时，这非常有用。This is useful when you need to know where the file is stored on the computer submitting the file. 此属性通常还用于确定原始文件名。This property is also commonly used to determine the original file name. 若要获取原始文件名，分析此属性的值。To get the original file name, parse the value of this property. > [!NOTE] > 属性为只读。The property is read-only. 如果你尝试将值分配给此属性，引发。If you attempt to assign a value to this property, a is thrown. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来显示客户端的计算机上的文件的完整路径。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the full path of the file on the client's computer. 对于此示例中正常工作，你需要创建一个名为目录`Temp`上你的计算机的驱动器 c。For this example to work properly, you need to create a directory called `Temp` on your computer's drive C. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlInputFileValue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputFileValue/CS/htmlinputfilevaluecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlInputFileValue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlInputFileValue/VB/htmlinputfilevaluevb.aspx#1)]

span.span: An attempt was made to assign a value to this property.
